title: (x) "Riggs" squooshed flare serif - Friz Quadrata {Stephen}
content:
Does anyone recognize this font? I can’t seem to find it anywhere online. Thanks. I look forward to reading your replies.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/unknown_font_4317.gif)
author: 1957sojourner

comments.content: Everything about it says [squooshed](http://web.archive.org/wiki/squooshed) [Friz Quadrata](http://web.archive.org/web/20060719212930/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&startrow=1&records=20&currpage=1&totalrecords=20&searchby=&searchID=&searchletter=&searchstr=friz&font_categories_checkbox=font_name_search&fontRendererText=Riggs) with custom ‘g’s.

Thank you for the quick reply. I’m new to this forum, and I appreciate all the help I can get.

Thanks again.
No problem. On second look, the ‘g’s aren’t custom at all. It’s just that they are so misshaped by the squooshing that they hardly recognizable anymore.
You were right on the money. Take Friz Quadrata and stretch it up & down, you end up with the font. Many thanks. 1957sojourner
